name: adonai-farm-management
description: Complete farm management system for livestock, workers, and operations

scripts.install-all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.railway:build: npm run build && cd backend && npm install
scripts.railway:start: sh -c 'cd backend && if [ -n "$DATABASE_URL" ]; then npm run pg:migrate; fi && node server.js'
